name: Open Wide (Ledermanzz)
description:
A pink, cute fairy enters a dark forest.
It is dark and full of creatures.

Run for your life
And do
NOT
get
cought.

Controls: Start - 'Left Click' Jump - 'Space'

Designer - Eden Lederman(zz)
 Guidance: Dani Bacon, Rutu Modan
Art and Interaction Class, Bezalel Academy of Arts and Design, 2022.
